casebody.data:
Mark JANUS, petitioner,
v.
AMERICAN FEDERATION OF STATE, COUNTY AND MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES, COUNCIL 31, et al. No. 16-1466. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 16, 2018.

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted. Motion of respondents for divided argument granted.
